Ripple was created, funded, and built by early Bitcoiners.

No. With Bitcoin, miners have complete control over which transactions to include in a block. The same is not true with Ripple. Validators do NOT have the power to make arbitrary decisions. The rules of the protocol determine which txns are valid. Validators order them.
